item.title: By: lauramoncur
item.dc:creator: lauramoncur
item.description:
I hear ya!
The LinkedIn spam has gotten so bad that I've considered just deleting my LinkedIn account. I know that would be bad for me if I ever tried to work in the "real world," but it's getting a bit out of hand.
item.content:encoded:
I hear ya!

The LinkedIn spam has gotten so bad that I’ve considered just deleting my LinkedIn account. I know that would be bad for me if I ever tried to work in the “real world,” but it’s getting a bit out of hand.
